title: Short-Intensive Course for Enhancing Language Learning Effects Based on SVVR (Spatial-Virtual Reality)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and introductory language learning experience
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing language role-play simulations using SVVR (360-degree video-based virtual reality) in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can utilize situational basic expressions of the target language with 80% or higher accuracy in an SVVR environment.
Learners can correct and reattempt 90% or more of errors occurring during SVVR activities through a feedback system.
Learners perform four or more active repetition activities weekly, improving language fluency scores by 20%.
Learners report a 15% or greater increase in learning immersion (cognitive, emotional, behavioral, and social engagement) in pre-post surveys.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
